text: @realDonaldTrump All you do is worry about your worthless narcissistic self as 16,703 Americans are DEAD (as of 9:58 am April 10) because YOU eliminated the pandemic protections President @BarackObama had in place and become YOU called the coronavirus a hoax early last month. You are scum!
